response.original_title: The Animals in Screen IV -15TH ANNIVERSARY SHOW 2023 at NIPPON BUDOKAN
response.overview: Fear, and Loathing in Las Vegas brings a live video, featuring their Nippon Budokan concert held in 2023 to celebrate their 15th anniversary. All songs performed in the concert are included! The limited edition also includes seven music videos featuring AI animations, as well as a book with long interviews with each member (subject to change).
response.title: The Animals in Screen IV -15TH ANNIVERSARY SHOW 2023 at NIPPON BUDOKAN
